879610.name: Girl Mod | GIRLS VR (create + pose in VR)
879610.description:
Step into a highly immersive life-sized VR character creator and design a woman from head to toe.
Then pose her any way you like in amazing scenes.
It's a whole new level of character creation and posing.

Customize her to your heart's content with tons of choices from hairstyles, hair colors, eyes, skintones, clothes and jewelry.

Then transport to incredible scenes and use your controllers to move and pose her in any way you like. Lift her up onto a floating hoverboard in a neon alley, or pose her like a bikini model on a moonlit beach. Move her hips and she'll look like she's dancing. Realistic skin and physics make her feel even more life-like.

Girls VR is compatible with HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.

Wishlist Now!
879610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
